attributes.title: WORST APP EVER
attributes.review: this app wouldn’t run and when it finally did, it kicked me out. i have never seen such a horrible app like this one. please take it down, it wasn’t useful, it was informational, and it was helpful at all.

attributes.title: app kept crashing
attributes.review: app is so poorly designed and it would not stop crashing even after I turned off my phone ✨ please consider its removal.

attributes.title: Don’t delete tiktok
attributes.review: Aside from wanting to keep tiktok this App is horrid. I was reluctant to even use that adjective because idk if trump can understand advance adjectives, but anyways at least he will be back on the streets soon

attributes.title: Horrible
attributes.review: This app is horrible Bc I wanted to see trumps plans on being president again and it kept on asking for my information which I did not want to give

attributes.title: ❤️tik tok🥰
attributes.review: The WORST app I’ve ever downloaded in my life! It completely hacked my phone after taking a WEEK to download. Don’t even think about downloading this thing and in my opinion apple needs to take it DOWN!!!!😡😱🤬

attributes.title: ✨i🧚hate😀it🦕here🥰
attributes.review: today i will be writing because this app made me go blind. I saw a huge ratchet lump of orange flesh on my screen and now i can never erase that from my memory. i’m so scared and now i will never be the same.

attributes.title: Omg im scared
attributes.review: So today I downloaded the Trump 2020 app, once I downloaded it I went on it and what I saw was so traumatizing I screamed! It was a picture of Trumps nudes. It looked like a sack of ✨O R A N G E S✨ it was disgusting. I’m never downloading a trump associated app ever again. My eyes are still scared from seeing that ✨C H E E T O✨ man.

attributes.title: 🤢I can’t🤮
attributes.review: Thought this app was anti trump just to find out it supports him?? I don’t condone these kind of actions, this is disgusting 🤢found this app to be completely useless!! -5/10 don’t download will spread fake news.

attributes.title: horrible😐
attributes.review: I got the app bc i wanted to rate it a 1 bc i don’t even like donald trump he’s so rasict and is a pervert. he likes younger girls WHEN HES MARRIED. my real president is obama😌💅🏽. even the app is bad bc once i got it the app was so laggy. i don’t like donald trump bc he’s rascist. ik my sleeping is bad 😭

attributes.title: USELESS AND INCOHERENT
attributes.review: This is a complete waste of space just like the seat of the presidency at the moment, another waste. It does even not work. Don’t forget to sanitize your phones after deleting this worthless app.
